sourcesContent:
<template>
  <el-row :wrap="true" :gutter="20" class="create-area">
    <el-col :xs="24" :sm="12" :md="6" :lg="4">
      <el-input
        v-model="newWords"
        :rows="3"
        type="textarea"
        placeholder="Please input"
      />
    </el-col>
    <el-col :xs="24" :sm="12" :md="6" :lg="4">
      <el-button type="primary" @click="handleAddClick">增加</el-button>
      <el-button @click="handleExportClick">导出</el-button>
    </el-col>
  </el-row>
</template>

<script>
export default {
  name: 'WordManagement',
  data() {
    return {
      newWords: ''
    }
  },
  methods: {
    handleAddClick() {
      this.$emit('update:newWords', this.newWords);
        this.newWords = ''
    },

    handleExportClick() {
      const data = {
        timestamp: new Date().toISOString(),
        words: props.words
      }

      const blob = new Blob([JSON.stringify(data, null, 2)], { type: 'application/json' })
      const url = URL.createObjectURL(blob)

      const a = document.createElement('a')
      a.href = url
      a.download = `words-${new Date().toLocaleDateString()}.json`
      document.body.appendChild(a)
      a.click()
      document.body.removeChild(a)

      ElMessage.success('导出成功') 
    }
  }
}
</script>

<style scoped>
.words-management {
  padding: 20px;
}

.word-item {
  font-size: 32px;
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  align-items: center;  /* 垂直居中 */
  justify-content: center;  /* 水平居中 */
}
:deep(.init) {
  background-color: #f5f7fa;
}
:deep(.recognized) {
  background-color: #67c23a;
}
:deep(.unrecognized) {
  background-color: #ff6666;
}
</style>
